casebody.data:
TULLY
v.
CITY OF WILMINGTON 348A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 18, 2016

Ms. Katie Weaver Hartzog, Ms. Jaye E. Bingham-Hinch, Attorneys at Law, For City of Wilmington.

Mr. S. Luke Largess, Cheyenne Chambers, Attorneys at Law, For Tully, Kevin J.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 16th of November 2016 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of November 2016."

Plaintiff shall have up to and including the 16th day of January 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
